channel.title: Help big time!
channel.description:
Hey my ::mute bans yourself... pritty fucked up...
Someone help me change it to (::mute) not (::mute ban!) And need help with (::ban) and (::ipban)
Please please PM back!

item.title: Help big time!
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Well as i don’t know what source you’re using for the ban command try
::banuser (userhere)

and for your ::ipban the person has to be logged on and you must spell there name exactly or it will DC you.

Read full topic
